metadata.title_text: The Orient What Men Are Talking About
metadata.physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the publication 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly'. The title is printed in a box in the center. The page features three articles and seven black-and-white photographs with captions. The edges of the page is slightly torn, especially at the bottom.
